name: Exp_Prc_Pnt_Add_EPDEQ100_Red_NonRed
action: <* DoNotResetAtt *><*SELECTVALUE(Exp_Ent_Grp_Part_Summary:EP-DEQ100)*>[IF]([NEQ](<* Eval(<*VALUE(Number of Equipment Points (0 - 1000))*>/100) *>,<* Eval(INT(<*VALUE(Number of Equipment Points (0 - 1000))*>/100)) *>)){<*SETATVQTY(Exp_Ent_Grp_Part_Summary:EP-DEQ100,<* Eval(INT(<*VALUE(Number of Equipment Points (0 - 1000))*>/100)+1) *>)*>}{<*SETATVQTY(Exp_Ent_Grp_Part_Summary:EP-DEQ100,<* Eval(INT(<*VALUE(Number of Equipment Points (0 - 1000))*>/100)) *>)*>}[ENDIF]<* DoResetAtt *>
